top_pain_points.pain: Old infrastructure preventing modern ML monitoring - can't retain talent due to outdated tooling
top_pain_points.example_quote: old infrastructure. can't retain talent. data drift and data quality issues.

top_pain_points.pain: Data drift and data quality issues degrading model accuracy over time
No visibility into model performance in production for underwriting and claims models
Risk scoring models degrading without early warning systems
Fraud detection models require constant monitoring but lack proper tooling

winning_value_props.value: Modern ML platform that helps attract and retain data science talent
Automated drift detection catches model degradation before it impacts claims processing
Data quality monitoring ensures underwriting models maintain accuracy
Real-time monitoring for fraud detection models

common_objections.objection: We have strict compliance requirements - can your platform meet them?
common_objections.effective_response: Arize is SOC2 compliant and works with major insurers including New York Life, PURE Insurance, and Die Mobiliar. We can deploy in your VPC for maximum data security.

common_objections.objection: Our data science team is small and may not have bandwidth to implement
common_objections.effective_response: Arize's SDK integration takes less than a day. Our customers find that the time saved on troubleshooting more than offsets implementation time - you'll get that time back within weeks.

Many insurance companies started that way but found maintaining internal tools creates technical debt and diverts data scientists from high-value work. Arize replaces that with a purpose-built platform.

discovery_questions.question: How are you currently monitoring for drift in your underwriting or claims models?
discovery_questions.tied_to_signal: Uses ML for underwriting or claims
discovery_questions.follow_up_if_yes: How quickly can you detect when drift is impacting business outcomes?
discovery_questions.follow_up_if_no: What happens when model accuracy degrades without early warning?

discovery_questions.question: Are you finding it challenging to retain ML talent given your current tooling?
discovery_questions.follow_up_if_yes: What do candidates typically ask about in terms of your ML infrastructure?
discovery_questions.follow_up_if_no: What tools have helped you retain your data science team?

discovery_questions.question: When a production model issue occurs, how long does it typically take to identify the root cause?
discovery_questions.follow_up_if_yes: Is that time acceptable given the potential revenue impact?

discovery_questions.question: How are you handling data quality monitoring for your ML pipelines?
discovery_questions.follow_up_if_yes: How often do data issues slip through to production?
